author: Scott Polacek
title: Sean Payton Says Saints Have 2020 NFL Draft War Room Set Up in Local Brewery
description: Unprecedented times call for unprecedented measures.       New Orleans Saints  head coach  Sean Payton  appeared on Wednesday's episode of the    Rich Eisen Show    and said the ...
content:
Brian Blanco/Associated Press
Unprecedented times call for unprecedented measures.
New Orleans Saints head coach Sean Payton appeared on Wednesday's episode of the Rich Eisen Show and said the NFC South team has set up its draft war room in a local brewery … [+1033 chars]
